title: North Korea-backed hackers target security researchers with 0-day
description: Google researchers say currently unfixed vulnerability affects a popular software package.

title: Lotus is the latest to show off a high-powered electric sedan—the Emeya
description: With up to 905 hp, the Emeya will reach 62 mph in under 2.8 seconds.

title: SpaceX broke its record for number of launches in a year
description: SpaceX aims to ramp up to a dozen launches per month next year.

title: How these parasitic worms turn brown shrimp into bright orange “zombies”
description: Infection activates gene expression for pigmentation, suppresses immune response.

title: NASA finally admits what everyone already knows: SLS is unaffordable
description: "At current cost levels the SLS program is unsustainable."

title: It’s really f—ing hot, and it’s really our fault
description: The hottest Northern Hemisphere summer on record follows climate-driven heat waves.

title: Musk calling shots on X content explains advertiser exodus, former exec says
description: Lawsuits won’t end the #StopToxicTwitter pressure campaign on X advertisers.

title: ZAP! Atari acquires beloved retro homebrew vendor AtariAge
description: "Atari is now taking its retro-related IP seriously," says AtariAge founder.

title: Senate confirms Biden FCC pick as 5 Republicans join Democrats in 55-43 vote
description: Anna Gomez confirmation means "FCC can act swiftly to restore net neutrality."

title: Dealmaster: Save on Apple, Dell, Lenovo laptops, Steelcase chairs, and more
description: Great savings on tools to help you get to work and stay productive.

title: Chrome turns 15 and is getting a big redesign
description: It has pastel colors, a longer menu, and not a single sharp corner.

title: Musk shut off Starlink to prevent Ukraine attack on Russian ships, report says
description: New details on how Musk thwarted Ukraine's submarine drone attack near Crimea.

title: Nintendo reportedly showing devs “Switch 2” with upscaled Breath of the Wild
description: DLSS, ray-tracing support could be in the cards for the new console in 2024.

title: OpenAI to host its first developer conference on November 6 in San Francisco
description: In-person event will have livestreamed keynote, show company's "latest work."

title: Demeo is one of the first “immersive” games announced for Apple Vision Pro
description: VR/MR gaming on the headset has been an afterthought for Apple, developers.

title: Honda is the latest automaker to switch EV charging plugs
description: Honda EVs will start adding North American Charging Standard ports in 2025.

title: How China gets free intel on tech companies’ vulnerabilities
description: If your company operates in China, it must reveal all hackable bugs to government.

title: Musk stiffed Twitter vendors and dared them to sue—dozens did just that
description: The ultimate guide to unpaid-bill suits filed against X, Musk's social network.

title: Ford’s electric Mustang Mach-E gets a $65,000 Rally-inspired version
description: Ford adds chunky tires and protective shielding, plus a new rallysport drive mode.
